title: The Curse of the Moonless Knight
description: It is the season of Samhain, also celebrated as Hallowe'en. The crisp of Fall is in the air. Spirits are amiss in the town of Hollow Creek when a portal that should've stayed closed, is accidentally opened. A medieval knight, misplaced in time, links sixteen year-old Alyson to an extraordinary discovery about herself, and her family. Embarking on a quest for knowledge, Alyson learns that sometimes in this magical world, you have to close your eyes... to see. And in order to forgive, you must first open your heart
author: Kristin Groulx
